actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution expressing the condolences of the House on the death of Nelson A. Rockefeller.

summary.text: Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of Nelson A. Rockefeller, former Vice President of the United States. Directs that a committee of Members of the House together with such Members of the Senate attend the memorial service. Declares that as a mark of further respect to the deceased the House adjourns.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the condolences of the House on the death of Nelson A. Rockefeller.
